help-file.title: "BLOOD ALLIANCE"
help-file.content: A Blood Reaver may find a willing target to have an alliance in blood with them. Once they are linked, if one of them drops below 50% of their health and the other has more than 70%, then damage to the weaker triggers some transfer of hitpoints from the stronger to the weaker member. This spell is usually used to link Blood Reavers with anti-paladins causing them to form a dark and terrible evil plague.
